descriptionHtml:
READ THIS:
I can´t upload this mod becaus it is a BAK. This Mod IS ONLY AVAIABLE ON STEAM WORKSHOP!!!!!!!

Talk to reno to get information about the books how to get money!!!!!
He will tell you where you can find the books.
There are four books from chapter 1 to chapter 4
I don´t know how to make that little quest right (the o.k buttom) there won´t be any quest markers!!!
so you REALY have to FIND them.
i´m going to place the books in a few dungeons. Only the first book is in the Merchanguild.
Talk to Reno he will tell you how to find them.
I´m working on these dungeons now i can take some time to fix them so at the moment there is only the first book

This mod adds a new Merchantguild to Whiterun, which is actually in porgress.
UPDATE: Added a Mapmarker to the Merchantguild.
UPDATE: Fixed some problems withe the door to the first etage.
NEW CONTENT:
Adds now the first etage to the guild, fixed some bugs and added new dialogs!!!!!

In the Merchantguild  you can find merchants, selling special staff for your caracter, i also added some guards. in the following days i try to make a little quest to start.
Talk to the Guard near the Goldchest or to Reno to get some information. i´m going to make a few little quest in the next following days.
These Merchants sell speciall things just have a look xD

NEW CONTENT: THE HISTORY OF THE MERCHANTGUILD!!!!!!!!!! Read the book placed in the Dwemershelf, to get more information about the History of the Merchantguild!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Please rate and leave a comment with the bugs you´ve found and what you would like to have in the Merchantguild
If you have a few ideas or if you want to help me just leave a comment or sent an e-mail to Philipp-Knittel@web.de
Thank you

My english isn´t that good and i´m sorry for my writing mistakes.

DON`T FORGETT TO RATE IF YOU LIKE IT!!!!!!!!!!!
author: USMCISAON
